source_text: To be known as the Leake Prospect, the tenement, covering some 66.7 km² in area, is considered highly prospective for copper and gold.
additional_details: The coverage area is specifically for the Leake Prospect, which refers to the exploration tenement E77/3152. The area was converted from km² to hectares (66.7 km² * 100 = 6670 ha).
